title: Ben Carson’s Violent History Ended As A Seventh Day Adventist – Do Gun Control Beliefs ...
text: In a new interview, Ben Carson’s violent history has come to light based upon the admissions of the 2016 GOP candidate. The retired neurosurgeon was once well known for separating conjoined twins, but when he was a teen he used those same hands for violence, including assault and stabbings. Carson says those days are well...
